title: Jace
description: She’s the enemy. Untouchable. A cartel princess with blood on her hands.But the second Leti walks into my club, looking for my help, I know one thing—she’s mine.She wants me to save her brother. To save her.One glance, and I’m already addicted. One touch, and I know I’ll never let her go.To have her, I’ll tear my enemies apart, burn their empire to the ground, and start a war I might not survive.They say I’m reckless. That I don’t know when to walk away.But for her?I’d risk it all.Jace (The Black Hornets MC #1) is a dark, steamy motorcycle club romance with forbidden love, high stakes, and an alpha antihero who will burn the world for the woman he craves.
author: Savannah Rylan
